resources.string: An unexpected error occurred, please try again
The file imported did not contain any identities. This indicates a corrupted backup file.
Files exported on Concordium MainNet, TestNet or StageNet are not compatible with the other chains. Please import on the correct chain.
Biometrics has been changed and therefore disabled.
Cannot connect. Please check the internet connection.
Cannot connect. Please check the internet connection.
Connection to server timed out. Please check the internet connection.
Cannot establish communication with the server.
Cannot establish communication with the server.
Please run the recovery and try again.
Select a way to import your wallet
Manually enter or paste all your 24 words in order as it was presented to you
Import via seed phrase or wallet private key
Use your exported backup file from your device
Be aware that you can not create new accounts or identities in your file wallet.
Password is not valid - minimum length is 6.
Passcodes do not match. Please try again
Passwords do not match. Please try again
Set a 6-digit passcode to secure your wallet.
Repeat a 6-digit passcode to secure your wallet.
Set a password with at least 6 characters.
Repeat your password to secure your wallet.
Enable biometrics for more convenient login.
Use biometrics to enable it for this app
%1$s has been verified by the identity provider. You can now start using the identity to create accounts

Your identity request was unfortunately rejected with the following reason:

%1$s

Rejected identity requests cannot be resolved, so the rejected identity will be discarded, after dismissing this notification.

Do you want to make another request now?
You can enter the new identity name here.
Select a provider to verify your identity

Your request has been submitted with the identity provider. Now you just have to wait for a moment for them to process your submission. Once your identity is verified, you can create your first account
Your request has been approved by identity provider. Now you can create an account and start using your wallet
We recommend that you unshield any Shielded balance today.
What would you like to name your account?
Ooops! This identity already has too many accounts submitted to the chain. Please select another identity to continue.
You already have the maximum number of accounts for this identity.
Account submitted. Once it\'s finalized, you can use the account from the account overview.
Account creation failed in the process of creation.
Account creation in progress.\n\nYou can start using this account once it’s been finalized on the chain.
On the Concordium Testnet, you can request 20000CCD to be deposited to an account to get you started.
This account has no identity data revealed.
You can enter the new account name here.
This balance shows your total CCD in this account. It does not include any other tokens.
All your wallets will be erased from this device. However, you can restore them at any time using the secret recovery phrase or the backup file. Proceed with erasing?
All the data has been successfully erased
Here you can export your identities, accounts and the address book.

The exported data includes private keys which give access to your identities and accounts. For this reason the data will be encrypted under a password that you will be asked to select during the process. It is important that you store the password safely and securely. The password will be needed for access to exported data (e.g. if you want to import an account into another CCD wallet).
Select an export password.\nThe password will be needed during import.
Entries do not match! Please try again.
Password is not valid - minimum length is 6.
The following accounts are either failed or not ready on the chain, so they cannot be exported.\n\n
If you encountered a problem, or need help with something, you can reach out to us via support@concordium.com
For more info about CryptoX Wallet you can visit concordium.com
File import is not possible when using a secret phrase
Invalid password or import file corrupted
Enter the password created when exporting the file

resources.string: By pressing Continue, you will be guided through setting up a new passcode. You will also get the option of enabling biometrics, or to continue without them.
Permission to use the camera is necessary to scan QR codes
The name can only contain letters, numbers, and these special characters: \"-\", \"_\", \",\", \".\", \"!\", \"?\". The name cannot be empty, or start or end with a space.
This account was not added to the address book, as it was already there.
You need to uninstall the app, and reinstall it, in order to continue
This account is imported without keys, and is read only
Passcode could not successfully be changed
You can enter an optional memo here
You did not provide any memoId. Continue without it?

Transaction memos are public and visible to everyone on the blockchain. Any memo sent with a transaction is permanent, and will be visible forever, so be careful what you write in the memo.\n\nAdding a memo will increase the transaction fee.
It is necessary to restore your data. Please, make backup.
Please make a back-up of your wallet
To add NFTs from a particular marketplace to your CryptoX wallet you have to enter the marketplace URL and name below.\nExample:
By clicking \'Connect\' you confirm the registration for the airdrop campaign at %1$s %2$s
This will clear the local WalletConnect database. You can do this if you experience connection problems with WalletConnect. A restart of the app will be required. Do you want to proceed?
dApp connection failed. Please, refresh the page and try again
Could not load the required data
The WalletConnect request account is not in this wallet
You must have at least one active account to continue
The wallet does not support the requested chains
The wallet does not support the requested methods
Only seed phrase wallets support this feature
Can\'t stringify the parameters as there is no schema
Insufficient funds to sign the transaction
New WalletConnect request is waiting on the home screen
Enter a contract index to add tokens.
This contract has no valid tokens
No updates made to token list
No tokens have been added to this account yet
Are you sure you want to hide %1$s token from your wallet?
%1$s has not been listed in your wallet till this transaction. You can accept it or remove it from the list.

CCD is the native token of the Concordium blockchain. Its main use cases are the payment of transaction fees, the payment for the execution of smart contracts, payments between users, payments for commercial transactions, staking, and the rewards offered to node operators.
Incorrect secret recovery phrase. Please verify that each index has the right word.
Manually enter all your 24 words in order as it was presented to you
Please enter your wallet private key exactly how it was presented to you
Recover your accounts and identities to connect them to your wallet
Scanning the Concordium blockchain. Hang on while we find your accounts and identities.

There was a problem contacting some identity providers. This means that some identities and accounts may not have been recovered. If you can see that something is missing, you can try to restart the recovery process, or you can try again later by starting the recovery process from the settings menu. The affected identity providers:
Below are two options for earning rewards on CryptoX Wallet:
As a validator you participate in the network by validating blocks on the Concordium network. This requires a minimum of %1$s CCD and access to a dedicated node.
Stake your CCD to earn rewards. Rewards can be restaked automatically.
You can delegate to an open pool of your choice, or stake using passive delegation.
Your stake can be modified at any time. If you decrease the amount or stop the delegation a cool-down period of [ X] days applies.
Estimated APY based on past results. Actual returns may vary.
Please note, a single account cannot both be a validator and delegator but it is possible to stop one and change to the other.

Stopping your delegation is subject to a cooldown period, in which the stake cannot be spent or transferred. \n\n At the end of the cooldown period, the delegated amount is unlocked on your public balance, and the funds will be at disposal again.
This account is not currently delegating any CCDs.
This account has no delegation registered. You can register a delegation with the button below.
This pool has been deregistered, and will stop validating on
The following changes will take effect on
The delegation will be stopped, and the delegation amount will be unlocked on the public balance of the account.
You don’t receive rewards from this part of stake now, this amount will be at disposal after cooldown period.
You can delegate to an open pool of your choice, or you can stake using passive delegation.
If you don\'t already know which validator pool you want to delegate an amount to, you can look for on ccdscan.io/staking

Passive delegation is an alternative to delegation to a specific validator pool that has lower rewards. With passive delegation you do not have to worry about the uptime or quality of a validator node.\n\nFor more info you can visit docs.concordium.com
I want to automatically add my staking rewards to my stake amount.

Setting your delegated amount to 0 will remove the delegation all together.\n\nDo you want to remove your delegation?
You are about to lock more than 95% of your total balance in a delegation stake.\n\nIf you don’t have enough unlocked CCD at your disposal, you might not be able to pay future transaction fees.

resources.string: Your current delegation amount will breach the new pool’s limits. To delegate to this pool you must first lower or stop your delegation and then wait for the cooldown to pass.
Lower delegation amount and stay with current pool
Your delegation amount is too large for this pool.

You have the option when adding a validator to open a staking pool or not. A staking pool allows others who want to earn rewards to do so without the need to run a node or become a validator themselves.

 To do this they delegate an amount to your staking pool which then increases your total stake and your chances of winning the lottery to bake a block. At each pay day the rewards will be distributed to you and your delegators.

 You can also choose not to open a pool, in which case only your own stake applies toward the lottery. You can always open or close a pool later.
When you open your validator as a pool, you earn commissions of stake delegated to your pool from other accounts:
Transaction fee is out of specified range
Validator reward is out of specified range
Your new validator keys have been generated. Before you can continue, you must export and save them. The keys will have to be added to the validator node.
This is your only chance to export and save the keys.\n\nThey cannot be recreated, so you will have to generate new keys and register them with a transaction, if you lose these.
You can choose to add a URL with metadata about your validator. Leave it blank if you don’t have any.
You can read more about the metadata URL on docs.concordium.com
Please enter a valid HTTP or HTTPS URL
This account has no validator registered.
This account has no validator registered. You can register a validator with the button below.
Waiting for validator transaction to finalize.
I want to automatically add my stake rewards to my stake amount.
Type the amount you want to stake
You are about to lock more than 95% of your total balance in a validator stake.\n\nIf you don’t have enough unlocked CCD at your disposal, you might not be able to pay future transaction fees.
Enter your new total validator stake
You are about to submit a register validator transaction that locks some of your funds in a stake. If you want to unlock the stake again, there will be a cooldown period.

Your validating transaction failed:

%1$s

Do you want to try again?
You submitted a transaction to stop your validator
Are you sure you want to make the following transaction to stop validating?
You are about to submit a transaction that lowers your validator stake. Reducing your stake is subject to a cooldown period, in which the stake cannot be spent or transferred

If you stop validating there is a cooldown period, after which the full stake amount will be unlocked on your public balance. 

If your pool has any delegators, they will be automatically moved to passive delegation. 

Deregistering the validator does not shut down your node. You must shut down the node in a separate action if you no longer wish to run a node on the Concordium blockchain.

You are about to self-suspend your validation.

Please be aware that:

 • Suspended nodes don’t earn rewards

 • Your delegators will stop earning rewards

 • Your delegators will be notified about the suspension

You have the option when adding a validator to open a staking pool or not. A staking pool allows others who want to earn rewards to do so without the need to run a node or become a validator themselves.

 To do this they delegate an amount to your staking pool which then increases your total stake and your chances of winning the lottery to bake a block. At each pay day the rewards will be distributed to you and your delegators.

 You can also choose not to open a pool, in which case only your own stake applies toward the lottery. You can always open or close a pool later.
If you want to set a new metadata URL, you can do so by pasting it below. It’s optional, so you can just leave it blank if you don’t want to make any changes.
Once your transaction has successfully finalized, the validator registration will take effect from the next pay day.\n\nRemember to restart your node with the validator keys.
Once your transaction has successfully finalized, the validator update will take effect from the next pay day.

plurals.name: baker_notice_message_update_decrease
plurals.item: Your decrease of the validator stake will take effect at the next pay day after a cooldown of %d day.\n\nOnce the transaction has finalized, you can see the time of the release on the validator status screen.

Your decrease of the validator stake will take effect at the next pay day after a cooldown of %d days.\n\nOnce the transaction has finalized, you can see the time of the release on the validator status screen.

resources.string: Once your transaction has successfully finalized, the pool settings update will take effect from the next pay day.

Once your transaction has successfully finalized, the new validator keys will take effect from the next pay day.\n\nThis means the node should be restarted with the new keys, as close to the next pay day as possible.

plurals.name: baker_notice_message_remove

Your validator will stop at the next pay day after a cooldown of %d days.\n\nOnce the transaction has finalized, you can see the estimated time on the validator status screen.

resources.string: Your backup has been saved to local storage.
Make sure to keep the keys safe, because they can be used to access your accounts.
Click the button below to reveal your private key for %1$s

If your account contains a lot of transactions, it may take a moment for CCDScan to prepare the file. Once the logs are ready, they will be downloaded to your device as a CSV file. Please note that if the account has a lot of transactions, the file size can be quite large.
Transaction logs of an account can be generated and saved via %1$s\n\nYou can also visit %1$s and manually generate your transaction logs from a desktop browser.
The transaction logs have been saved
There are no transaction logs available for this account
The CryptoX wallet is self-custodial, has best-in-class security and is trusted by thousands.
Seamlessly store, spend and send tokens, crypto, and collectibles.
Access a global ecosystem and contribute to a secure digital future.
I have read and understood the Terms and Conditions and the Privacy policy
I consent to activity tracking inside the app
Keep up with everything that\'s happening here
Find out when you get or receive payment requests. Get updates on new features, discount and promo

• A file that can be exported and imported 
• Grants access to all connected accounts 
• Can be used to recover a file wallet 
• Used in older Concordium wallets
• Consists of 24 words \n• Grants access to all connected accounts \n• Can be used to recover a seed phrase wallet

• Consists of 128 characters long hexadecimal string 
• Grants access to all connected accounts 
• Can be used to recover a seed phrase wallet 
• Used in older Concordium wallets
You can import your wallet with a secret seed phrase, wallet private key or a backup file.
%1$d-digit passcode to secure your wallet. Remember it to enter the wallet again
It should be the same %1$d-digit passcode you entered in the previous step
Failed to set up passcode, please contact \nsupport@concordium.com
After you log out now, you’ll be able to sign in faster when you come back
I have securely backed up my seed phrase
Your seed phrase is the access key to your wallet. If you lose it, you will lose access to all your funds. Make sure to store it in a secure place.
Failed to set up the wallet, please contact \nsupport@concordium.com
Your seed phrase is the access key to all the funds in your wallet. If you forget it you will lose access to your wallet(s). Keep it somewhere safe
Failed to reveal the phrase, please contact \nsupport@concordium.com
Your wallet private key is the access key to all the funds in your wallet. Copy it and keep it safe. To avoid mistakes, do not write it down manually.
Failed to reveal the key, please contact \nsupport@concordium.com
Note that all the information above will be revealed to the connected service.
You are unable to prove the entire request. You may go through the statements, but you won\'t be able to approve the request.
This will prove that your %1$s is between %2$s and %3$s
This will prove that your %1$s is 1 of the following: %2$s
This will prove that your %1$s is none of the following: %2$s
You do not hold any credentials from the issuer that the verifier requested.
Insufficient funds at disposal to pay the fee
To enhance your experience, we would like to track your app usage. But rest assured, we will not capture or track funds, transactions or any other personal data.
CCD is listed in the following external exchanges and services. Some of these venues will guide you through their onboarding process and wallet choices.

The information regarding the CCD on any Concordium website does not constitute an offer or solicitation to purchase CCDs. The information on the CCD on this website is only directed to persons in countries other than the United States. 

 Without limiting the foregoing, in no event would any offering of CCD by Concordium be intended to be available to residents of the United States. 

 By clicking on any of the above links, you may be getting access to various services, including trading services. These services are offered by third parties and the use of such services are subject to terms of conditions defined by such third parties and Concordium is not responsible for and does not assume any liabilities in relation to the use of such services.
No sites available for this network
Which account do you want to use with the external service?
And be part of a safer digital future
See the transaction details in your wallet
To use all features please complete your wallet set-up.
Your account will be here once your set-up is complete.
Next step: Save your seed phrase
Be aware that adding an additional wallet increases complexity. This should only be used by experienced Concordium users who require access to both a file wallet and a seed phrase wallet.
You can now add and remove wallets.

You can have a total of 2 wallets in CryptoX. They can be:\n • 1 file wallet (imported via backup file)\n • 1 seed phrase wallet (newly created or imported via either seed phrase or wallet private key)
You can add a new or existing Concordium seed phrase wallet. After adding it you will be able to switch between your seed phrase wallet and your file wallet. \n

You can add an existing Concordium file wallet. After adding it you will be able to switch between your seed phrase wallet and your file wallet. \n\n Be aware that you can not create new accounts or identities in your file wallet.

Be aware that you can not create new accounts or identities in your file wallet. \n\n But after the import you will be able to connect a new or existing Concordium seed phrase wallet which has full functionality. After connecting you will be able to switch between your seed phrase wallet and your file wallet.
After removing a wallet you will not be able to access it in CryptoX. But you can restore it whenever you like.
Be aware that you can not create new accounts or identities in your file wallet. \n\n We recommend that you migrate to a seed phrase wallet in order to make use of the full range of CryptoX features.
You have to complete 2 easy steps to create your wallet:
You can import your wallet with a seed phrase, or a wallet private key.
We recommend that you migrate to a seed phrase wallet in order to make use of the full range of CryptoX features.
Your validation is primed for suspension

Your node was inactive for a number of hours. If it has been inactive for too long it will be suspended. Suspended nodes don’t earn rewards.\n\nTo prevent suspension ensure your node is up-to-date and active. Once your node is active you will no longer be primed for suspension.

Your node does not earn rewards at the moment.\n\nTo lift the suspension and earn rewards again ensure your node is up-to-date and click “Resume\u00A0validation” in the “Change\u00A0validating\u00A0status” menu.
Your delegation amount does not earn rewards until validation is resumed.
